onlineLibrary.name: current-example-models
onlineLibrary.description: LANDFIRE example state-and-transition simulation models representing current conditions for selected Biophysical Settings.

onlineLibrary.name: reference-condition-models
onlineLibrary.description: LANDFIRE reference condtion state-and-transition simulation models developed to simulate the US historic range of variability (HRV) in landscape vegetation composition and disturbance regimes.
